messageBody:
Dave Astels wrote:

>>I must have missed it... When is it due for publishing?
>>
>>
>
>Sometime this spring. It's been tech reviewed (very favourably :-),
>the foreword is written (a smashing one too :-), it's being indexed as
>we "speak", the cover is being put together, etc. and I'm doing last
>minute polishing. So... Real Soon Now.
>
>

I had the pleasure of being a reviewer of Dave's upcoming book. It's
chock full of concrete examples of test-driven development in action.
Moreover, it answers a lot of questions frequently posted on this list
with respect to writing effective tests with JUnit. But Dave doesn't
stop there. He also shows you how to use JUnit extensions and other
xUnit tools. Indeed, throughout the book he's building an application
test-first and reaches for a variety of tools along the way.

So it's really at least two great books in one!

Mike
